languages.text: "Лишь тем мирянам, кто жаждет испытать Движущую силу, позволено переступать порог обители. Все иные являются преступными грешниками. Ты не принадлежишь к братству электрожрецов, но прибыл{mf||а} с добрыми намерениями. Если ты не искал{mf||а} мудрости Омниссии, значит, Движущая сила сама привела тебя сюда для обретения ее".

"Only those laypeople who desire to experience the Motive Force are allowed to cross this monastery's threshold. All others are profaners and criminals. You do not belong to the fraternity of Electro-Priests, but your intentions are good. If you were not seeking the Omnissiah's wisdom, then it was the Motive Force itself that brought you here to find it."
languages.original_text: "Лишь тем мирянам, кто жаждет испытать Движущую силу, позволено переступать порог обители. Все иные являются преступными грешниками. Ты не принадлежишь к братству электрожрецов, но прибыл{mf||а} с добрыми намерениями. Если ты не искал{mf||а} мудрости Омниссии, значит, Движущая сила сама привела тебя сюда для обретения ее".

traits.locale_text: "Only those laypeople who desire to experience the Motive Force are allowed to cross this monastery's threshold. All others are sinners and criminals. You do not belong to the fraternity of Electro-Priests, but your intentions are good. If you were not seeking the Omnissiah's wisdom, then it was the Motive Force itself that brought you here, that you might receive it."

If you were not seeking the Omnissiah's wisdom, then it was the Motive Force itself that brought you here, that you might receive it."

languages.text: "Nur jene Laien, die begehren, die Antriebskraft zu erleben, dürfen die Schwelle dieses Klosters überqueren. Alle anderen sind Lästerer und Verbrecher. Ihr gehört zwar nicht der Bruderschaft der Elektropriester an, doch Ihr habt gute Absichten. Wenn Ihr nicht auf der Suche nach der Weisheit des Omnissiah wart, dann war es die Antriebskraft selbst, die Euch hergeführt hat, um sie zu finden."
languages.original_text: "Only those laypeople who desire to experience the Motive Force are allowed to cross this monastery's threshold. All others are profaners and criminals. You do not belong to the fraternity of Electro-Priests, but your intentions are good. If you were not seeking the Omnissiah's wisdom, then it was the Motive Force itself that brought you here to find it."

traits.locale_text: "Nur jene Laien, die begehren, die Antriebskraft zu erleben, dürfen die Schwelle dieses Klosters überqueren. Alle anderen sind Lästerer und Verbrecher. Ihr gehört zwar nicht der Bruderschaft der Elektropriester an, doch Ihr habt gute Absichten. Wenn Ihr nicht auf der Suche nach der Weisheit des Omnissiah wart, dann war es die Antriebskraft selbst, die Euch hergeführt hat, um sie zu finden."

languages.text: « Seuls les profanes désireux de faire l'expérience de la Force Motrice sont autorisés à franchir le seuil de ce monastère. Les autres ne sont que des profanateurs et des criminels. Bien que vous n'apparteniez pas à la fraternité des électro-prêtres, vos intentions sont bienveillantes. Si vous ne cherchiez pas la sagesse de l'Omnimessie, alors c'est la Force Motrice elle-même qui vous a {mf|amené|amenée} ici pour la découvrir. »
languages.original_text: "Only those laypeople who desire to experience the Motive Force are allowed to cross this monastery's threshold. All others are profaners and criminals. You do not belong to the fraternity of Electro-Priests, but your intentions are good. If you were not seeking the Omnissiah's wisdom, then it was the Motive Force itself that brought you here to find it."

traits.locale_text: « Seuls les profanes désireux de faire l'expérience de la Force Motrice sont autorisés à franchir le seuil de ce monastère. Les autres ne sont que des profanateurs et des criminels. Bien que vous n'apparteniez pas à la fraternité des électroprêtres, vos intentions sont bienveillantes. Si vous ne cherchiez pas la sagesse de l'Omnimessie, alors c'est la Force Motrice elle-même qui vous a {mf|amené|amenée} ici pour la découvrir. »

languages.text: “只有那些渴望体验源力的教外人士，才有权跨过这座修道院的门槛。至于其他教外人士，都会被视为亵渎者和罪犯。尽管你不属于电僧兄弟会，但你的意图是善意的。如果你并非寻求欧姆尼塞亚的智慧，那一定是源力本身指引你来到此地。”
languages.original_text: "Only those laypeople who desire to experience the Motive Force are allowed to cross this monastery's threshold. All others are profaners and criminals. You do not belong to the fraternity of Electro-Priests, but your intentions are good. If you were not seeking the Omnissiah's wisdom, then it was the Motive Force itself that brought you here to find it."

traits.locale_text: “只有那些渴望体验原初动力的教外人士，才有权跨过这座修道院的门槛。至于其他教外人士，都会被视为亵渎者和罪犯。尽管你不属于驭电祭司兄弟会，但你的意图是善意的。如果你并非寻求欧姆尼塞亚的智慧，那一定是原初动力本身指引你来到此地。”

languages.text: 「この修道院の敷居をまたぐことを許される大衆は、原動力を体験したいと願う者のみだ。それ以外の者は冒涜者であり犯罪者である。あなたはエレクトロ・プリーストの仲間に属している者ではないが、あなたの意図は善良だ。もしあなたが万機神の知恵を求めていないのであれば、あなたをここに連れてきたのは、それを見つけるための原動力そのものなのだ」
languages.original_text: "Only those laypeople who desire to experience the Motive Force are allowed to cross this monastery's threshold. All others are profaners and criminals. You do not belong to the fraternity of Electro-Priests, but your intentions are good. If you were not seeking the Omnissiah's wisdom, then it was the Motive Force itself that brought you here to find it."

traits.locale_text: 「この修道院の敷居をまたぐことを許される大衆は、原動力を体験したいと願う者のみだ。それ以外の者は冒涜者であり犯罪者である。あなたはエレクトロ・プリーストの仲間に属している者ではないが、あなたの意図は善良だ。もしあなたが万機神の知恵を求めていないのであれば、あなたをここに連れてきたのは、それを見つけるための原動力そのものなのだ」

languages.text: «Solo se permite cruzar el umbral de este monasterio a los laicos que deseen experimentar la Fuerza Motriz. Todos los demás son profanadores y criminales. No pertenece a la fraternidad de los Electrosacerdotes, pero tus intenciones son buenas. Si no buscaba la sabiduría del Omnissiah, entonces fue la propia Fuerza Motriz la que le trajo aquí para encontrarla».
languages.original_text: "Only those laypeople who desire to experience the Motive Force are allowed to cross this monastery's threshold. All others are profaners and criminals. You do not belong to the fraternity of Electro-Priests, but your intentions are good. If you were not seeking the Omnissiah's wisdom, then it was the Motive Force itself that brought you here to find it."

traits.locale_text: «Solo se permite cruzar el umbral de este monasterio a los laicos que deseen experimentar la Fuerza Motriz. Todos los demás son profanadores y criminales. No pertenece a la fraternidad de los Electrosacerdotes, pero tus intenciones son buenas. Si no buscaba la sabiduría del Omnissiah, entonces fue la propia Fuerza Motriz la que le trajo aquí para encontrarla».

languages.text: "Yalnızca Devinim Gücü'nü tecrübe etme arzusundaki avamın bu manastırın kapısından girmesine müsaade edilir. Diğer herkes ya dinsiz ya da suçludur. Elektro Rahip kardeşliğinden değilsin belki lakin niyetin iyi. Hermesih'in bilgeliğini aramıyor olsan bile seni buraya getiren ve onu bulmanı sağlayan, Devinim Gücü'nün ta kendisidir."
languages.original_text: "Only those laypeople who desire to experience the Motive Force are allowed to cross this monastery's threshold. All others are profaners and criminals. You do not belong to the fraternity of Electro-Priests, but your intentions are good. If you were not seeking the Omnissiah's wisdom, then it was the Motive Force itself that brought you here to find it."

traits.locale_text: "Yalnızca Devinim Gücü'nü tecrübe etme arzusundaki avamın bu manastırın kapısından girmesine müsaade edilir. Diğer herkes ya dinsiz ya da suçludur. Elektro Rahip kardeşliğinden değilsin belki ama niyetin iyi. Hermesih'in bilgeliğini aramıyor olsan bile seni buraya getiren ve onu bulmanı sağlayan, Devinim Gücü'dür."
